mapper.insert: insert into "problem" (assignment_id, title, description, full_score, space_limit, time_limit, index_in_assignment, solution, type) VALUES (#{assignmentId}, #{title}, #{description}, #{fullScore}, #{spaceLimit}, #{timeLimit}, #{indexInAssignment}, #{solution}, #{type});
mapper.select: select id, assignment_id, title, description, full_score, space_limit, time_limit, number_submit, number_solve, index_in_assignment, solution from "problem" where assignment_id = #{id} and status = 'public' order by index_in_assignment;

select id, assignment_id, title, description, full_score, space_limit, time_limit, number_submit, number_solve, index_in_assignment, solution from "problem" where valid and id in ( select distinct problem_id from "problem_tag" where valid and tag_id = #{id}) and status = 'public';

select id, assignment_id, title, description, full_score, space_limit, time_limit, number_submit, number_solve, index_in_assignment, solution from "problem" where valid
and (status = 'public' or status = 'closed')
and (id in (select distinct problem_id from "problem_tag" where valid and tag_id in (
#{tag} ) or title like '%'||#{title}||'%')) order by id offset #{param1.offset} limit #{param1.limit};
